Articles.Content: In the settings, any time I want to set up my joystick, the game detects the axis and joystick but it dosent save the axis for roll yaw or pitch. It saves the buttons some how...

Hi @Sep, welcome to the forums.

I know that joysticks work with KSP, but I will need more information from you to diagnose your issue, what operating system and joystick are you using, and have you calibrated it and plugged it in before starting KSP?
